goalSetting.title: Beakanya Maikaelelo a Gago a Ntlha
goalSetting.mainQuestion: Leeto lengwe le lengwe le tlhoka mafelo a go fitlha. Ke maikaelelo a gago a ntlha a madi afe a a botlhokwa?
goalSetting.instruction: Tlhopha a le mongwe go simolola. O ka a fetola morago.
goalSetting.customPlaceholder: Tsenya bokae jwa maikaelelo a gago

goals.retirement: Simolola Madi a Me a a Tlhokomelolang

goalSet.title: Maikaelelo a Beakantswe! üéâ
goalSet.message: Gonabotse! O beakantse maikaelelo a gago go {{amount}} bakeng sa {{goalTitle}}. A re simolole go ithuta ka mokgwa wa madi a a kopaneng!

simulate.title: Tshwantshetsa
simulate.subtitle: Bona kamoo madi a gago a ka golang/a fokotseng ka nako
simulate.conservativeDesc: Kotsi e e kwa tlase, dipoelo tse di tsitsitseng
simulate.moderateDesc: Kotsi le poelo tse di lekaneng
simulate.aggressiveDesc: Kotsi e e kwa godimo, dipoelo tse di nonofileng tse di ka nnang teng
simulate.projectedTotalValue: Bogolo jwa Kakaretso jo bo Tshwantsheditsweng
simulate.investmentGrowth: Kgolo ya Madi a a Tsenngwang
simulate.paymentTooSmall: ‚ö†Ô∏è Tefo e nyane thata go lefa mokgweetsi kgotsa nako e fedile ka madi a a setseng:
simulate.roundUp100: Phatlalatsa go R100 e e latelang
simulate.add200Desc: Lefela R200 e e oketsegileng kgwedi le kgwedi go fokotsa monyaka le dikgwedi.
simulate.add500Desc: Lefela R500 e e oketsegileng kgwedi le kgwedi go lefa ka bonako.
simulate.roundUp100Desc: Phatlalatsa tefo ya gago go R100 e e latelang.
simulate.thirteenthDesc: Dira tefo e lekanang le e nngwe e e oketsegileng ya kgwedi ngwaga le ngwaga.
simulate.compoundGrowthInsight: Madi a gago a a tsenngwang a ka gola a feta go farologana ga dikgabane tsa gago ka kgolo e e kopaneng!
simulate.timeInsight: Ka dingwaga tse di {{years}}, o fa monyaka o o kopaneng nako e e lekaneng go dira.
simulate.contributionInsight: Modiro o o molemo! Go ntsha R{{amount}} kgwedi le kgwedi go go beya mo tseleng e e nonofileng ya go fitlhelela maikaelelo a gago.
simulate.debtInsight: Go oketsa tefo ya gago ka le fa e le bokae bo bongwe bo ka fokotsa thata dikgwedi tsa go lefa le go fokotsa monyaka wa kakaretso.
simulate.savingsTableHint: Madi a a Bolokilweng: monyaka wa ngwaga o tloaela go oketsega fa madi a ntse a gola (a a kopaneng).
simulate.debtTableHint: Mokgweetsi: monyaka wa ngwaga o tloaela go fokotsega fa madi a a ntlha a lefiwa.
simulate.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Seno ke tshwantshetso e e bonolo bakeng sa maikaelelo a thuto. Dipoelo tsa nnete di ka farologana thata ka ntlha ya phetoho ya mmaraka, madi a a lefwang le dilo tse dingwe. Tiro ya kgale ga e tiise dipoelo tsa bokamoso.
simulate.chartError: Karolo ya tshato e paletse go bontsha. Seno se diragala gantsi fa module ya motheo ya react-native-svg e sa kgokagantswe/e sa tsenngwa mo go ageng ga setshidiso. O santse o ka dirisa simulator ntle le tshato.
simulate.chartFixTips: Ditshitshinyo tsa go lokisa: iOS ‚Üí `cd ios && pod install`, mme o tlhatlobe & o age gape. Android ‚Üí `cd android && ./gradlew clean`, mme o age gape.
simulate.investmentProjectionData: Datha ya Tshwantshetso ya Go Tsaya Madi
simulate.saveMonthsInterest: Boloka dikgwedi tse di {{months}} ¬∑ monyaka wa {{interest}}
simulate.scenarioProjection: Tshwantshetso eno ya {{scenarioName}} e bontsha poelo ya ngwaga ya {{returnRate}}% e e kopaneng kgwedi le kgwedi. Ka ditshitshinyo tsa gago tsa jaanong mo godimo ga dingwaga tse di {{years}} {{yearUnit}}, kakaretso ya gago e e tshwantsheditsweng e tla nna {{total}} e leng {{growth}} kgolo e e kopaneng.
simulate.scenarioImplication: Se se bolelang: Mokgwa wa {{scenarioName}} o lebisitse go ka nna {{returnRate}}% ka ngwaga ka palogare mo dinakong tse di telele, o amogela phetoho ya {{volatility}}.
simulate.scenarioDisclaimer: Dipoelo tsa nnete di farologana; seno ga se tiisetso. Se dirise go utlwa kamoo sekgele le nako di fetolang dipoelo.

compounding.title: Molemo wa go Gola ga Madi
compounding.description: Ithute ka fa madi a gago a ka golang ka teng ka bonako jo bogolo ka nako ka nonofo ya ditswala tse di kopantsweng.

concept.title: Kakanyo
concept.content: Akanya gore o na le setlhare sa madi. Ditswala tse di kopantsweng di tshwana le go jala dipeu tse di welang mo setlhareng sa gago, gore di gole di nne ditlhare tse dintsha tsa madi.

coreIdea.title: Kakanyo ya Ntlha
coreIdea.content: O bona tswala mo madining a gago. Moragonyana o bona *tswala mo tswaleng ya gago*. Seo ke molemo.

interactive.title: E Bone e Bereka
interactive.content: A re e bone e bereka. Gogela se se sutlang go bona ka fa peeletso ya R10,000 e golang ka teng ka 8% tswala.

quiz.title: Potso e Bonako
quiz.question: Ke eng se se nang le nonofo e kgolo mo go goleng ga madi?

emergencyFund.title: Madi a Maemo a Tsietso a Tlhalosiwa
emergencyFund.description: Lebaka leo o tlhokang madi a maemo a tsietso le gore o swanetse go boloka mang pele o ka peeletsa.

why.title: Goreng o Itlhakanyetse?
why.content: Botshelo bo a direga‚Äîgo latlhegelwa ke tiro, go baakanywa ga dikoloi, dituelo tsa kalafi. Madi a maemo a tsietso a go thibela go tsena mo dikadimong (kgotsa go rekisa dipeeletso ka nako e e maswe).

howMuch.title: Ke Bokae?
howMuch.content: Molao o o tlwaelesegileng: dikgwedi di le 3‚Äì6 tsa ditshenyegelo tse di botlhokwa. Simolola ka maikaelelo a mannye (R5,000‚ÄìR10,000), o bo o age.

interactive.title: Maikaelelo a Gago
interactive.content: Gogela go beakanya dilo tse di botlhokwa tsa kgwedi (rente, dijo, dipalangwa). Re tla go bontsha maikaelelo a maemo a tsietso a dikgwedi di le 3‚Äì6.

quiz.title: Tlhatlhobo e Bonako
quiz.question: Madi a maemo a tsietso a swanetse go bolokwa kae?

options.volatileStock: Mo ETF ya masheya a a fetogang
options.safeAccount: Mo akhaonteng e e sireletsehileng, e e bonolo go e fitlhelela

firstPortfolio.title: Go Aga Pothifolio ya Gago ya Ntlha
firstPortfolio.description: Tlhama pothifolio ya dipeeletso e e farologaneng e e tsamaelanang le maikaelelo a gago le go amogela kotsi.

goals.title: Simolola ka Maikaelelo
goals.content: Nako + maikaelelo = kabo. Maikaelelo a nakwana ‚Üí dithoto tse di sireletsehileng. Maikaelelo a nako e telele ‚Üí dithoto tsa kgolo e ntsi.

diversify.title: Go Farologanya
diversify.content: Tsenyanya mefuta ya dithoto (masheya, dipanka, madi) le mafelo gore o mongwe yo o latlhegetseng a se ka a ntsha sekepe sotlhe.

interactive.title: Leka Kabo
interactive.content: Sutisa di-slider tsa masheya/dipanka/madi. Bona phetogo e e akantsweng le poelo ya nako e telele di fetoga ka nako ya boammaaruri.

quiz.title: Tlhatlhobo e Bonako
quiz.question: Ke molemo ofe o mogolo wa go farologanya?

options.reduceRisk: Go fokotsa kotsi go tswa peelet≈°ong e le nngwe

riskReturn.title: Go Tlhaloganya Kotsi le Poelo
riskReturn.description: Bona kamano gare ga kotsi le dikgonagalo tsa poelo mo peeletson.

intro.title: Kotsi ke Eng?
intro.content: Kotsi ke gore peeletso ya gago e ka tlhagafala kae kana e wa. Kotsi e kgolo e ka raya poelo e kgolo ‚Äî fela gape le go wa go kgolo.

tradeoff.title: Phetolo
tradeoff.content: Dilo tse di sireletsegileng (jaaka madi) di na le dipoelo tse di kwa tlase. Dilo tse di kotsing (jaaka di-stock) di ka gola thata fa nako e tsamaya fela di sisinyega thata.

interactive.title: Tlhopha Tsela ya Gago
interactive.content: Tsamaisa selaedara gare ga "go sireletsega" le "kotsi" go bona gore go fetofetoha le poelo ya nako e telele go ka fetoga jang.

quiz.title: Sekaseka ka Bonako
quiz.question: Ke khakanyo efe e e nepagalang?

options.A: Dipoelo tse dikgolo ka nako tsotlhe di raya kotsi e nnye
options.B: Dipoelo tse dikgolo tse di ka nnang gona gantsi di tla le kotsi e kgolo

taxEfficient.title: Go Peeletsa ka Mokgwa o o Dirang Traka
taxEfficient.description: Ithute ka diakhaonto tse di se nang traka / tse di nang mehola ya traka le go baya ka bohlale go boloka go le gontsi mo dituelong tsa gago.

wrappers.title: Dirisa Sekoahelo
wrappers.content: Diakhaonto tse di nang mehola ya traka jaaka RA, di sireletsa kgolo/dipoelo mo trakaing e sengwe.

placement.title: Lefelo la Dilo
placement.content: Baya dilo tse di sa dirang sentle mo trakeng (se kaya, di-bond funds, batefi ba dipoelo tse dikgolo) mo diakhaontong tse di sireletsegile mo trakeng pele.

interactive.title: Go Baya ka Bohlale
interactive.content: Goga di-funds mo "Tse di nang Traka" kgotsa "Tse di nang Mehola ya Traka" dipokete. Bona tekano ya ka morago ga traka e ntse e tokafala.

quiz.title: Tlhatlhoba ka Bonako
quiz.question: Ke kgato efe e e tlwaelegileng e e DIRANG THATA ka traka?

options.A: Go tshwara di-bond funds mo akhaontong e e nang mehola ya traka
options.B: Go tshwara di-bond funds mo akhaontong ya brokerage e e nang traka

firstLesson.title: Thuto ya Ntlha
firstLesson.description: Fedisa thuto ya gago ya ntlha

quizMaster.title: Mogaka wa Dipotso
quizMaster.description: Fedisa dipotso tsa maemo a a fa gare

reward.collectedMessage: O gonne data ya 500MB! E ipelele!
reward.alreadyCollectedMessage: O setse o tsere moputso wa gago wa 500MB!
reward.notEligibleMessage: Fedisa diphitlhelelo tsotlhe go tsaya moputso wa gago!

languageSelector.subtitle: Tlhopha puo e o e batlang go ithuta

takeYourTime.title: Tseya Nako
takeYourTime.description: O se ka wa potlakela dithuto. Tseya nako go tlhaloganya kgopolo nngwe le nngwe.

practiceMakesPerfect.title: Boitireletso bo Dira Boitekanelo
practiceMakesPerfect.description: Boela dithutong mme o leke dikarolo tse di dirisanang makgetlho a le mantsi.

learnDaily.title: Ithute Letsatsi le Letsatsi
learnDaily.description: Dirisa metsotso e le 5-10 fela letsatsi le letsatsi go aga kitso ya gago ya tsa madi.

errors.noUserSignedIn: Ga go na modirisi yo o tseneng
errors.userDocumentNotFound: Tokomane ya modirisi ga e a bonwa
